Cleaning & Recovering

Part of the service that we offer to each and every one of our customers is cleaning and re-covering of all our canvas and manufactured products. Like anything else, these products will last much longer if they are properly cared for and maintained. Over time the sun, rain, wind and other natural elements will take their toll on the strength and durability of canvas products. Bring them to us for complete cleaning and re-covering and we guarantee you'll save money in the long run!
